name: Drink It
overview: Game entry of the Karoshi 2006 MSX-BASIC Game Contest. The aim of the game is to make Mr. Nakago get the highest possible score (alcohol degrees). The game will finish when you loose 5 drinks or the score decreases to zero. Get the WC symbol to make Mr. Nakago piss and so you'll get an extra bonus, and avoid the coffees (with a bit of salt) cause it will divide your score by two.
